explains: n. 金融家，理财家，财政家；投资家，（为项目或企业）提供资金者
v. 对……提供资金；从事欺骗性金融活动，欺骗

sentences.en: Warren Buffett, the good natured financier, became a homespun folk hero, without the tools and overalls.
sentences.cn: 生性善良的金融家沃伦•巴菲特变成了一个朴实的民间英雄，没有工具和工作服。

sentences.en: At mid-century, an Antwerp financier only slightly exaggerated when he claimed, "One can no more trade without bills of an exchange than sail without water."
sentences.cn: 在这个世纪中叶，一位安特卫普的金融家略微夸张地说道：“没有汇票就不能交易，正如没有水就不能航行一样。”

sentences.en: My background is as a financier.
